choices: Inject some vitamin U into the story!
1.content: Grabbing a bag of chips from the pantry, you recline on (or rather, into) the couch, fumble around for the remote, and bring up the channel guide:
1.title: Hibernation station, A.K.A. the couch!

choices: Other (plants, monsters, pokemon, aliens, proletariats, the good stuff)
11.content:
More menus! Arghh!

Which type of creature are you interested in?
11.title: It's like Animal Planet, only cooler!

111.content: Now, pick another sub-category. If you're really too impatient to sit through the menus, just hit the "recently added" button to see the highest rated new footage, instantly.
111.title: No, you can't find your mother-in-law here.

choices: Snails, Jellyfish, coral reefs, whatever sinks your boat.
1111.content: Seafood is your thing, eh? You sea food, you eat i- why would I even make that joke...
1111.title: Obligatory fish pun

11121.content: Now our island has a wide range of habitats and ecozones where many different snakes are able to live, the jungle contains our pythons constrictors and anacondas, as well as our mated pair of king cobras. The barren region holds our more poisonous snakes like spitting cobras and a variety of rattlers and vipers. The beach holds coral king and sea snakes, ready to eat. And we have many assorted snakes that I don't even know the names of yet in out grasslands and Forrest terrains. So the question is, what's your favourite snake.
11121.title: Some sort of snake.

1113.content: Amphibians. There are only 3 groups for these, because there are only 3 amphibian classes. Don't try and argue it, we've always been at war with Eurasia.
1113.title: Crank up that AMPhibian!

choices: In a domestic situation (House, Farm, etc.(Zoos DO NOT count))
In the wild, or in a Zoo
112.content:
So, you're a mammal, eh? Well, they didn't pay me enough to make all these menus in time for the deadline, so this is the best I could do.

Where would you normally find the animal you want?
112.title: Mammalamman!

1121.content: Well take your pick house or farm, we have only a short time till the filming starts you know!
1121.title: In a domestic situation (House, Farm, etc.(Zoos...

11211.content: Now there are a few types of house animals, the canines, the felines, and the vermines, (haha) but which one
11211.title: House

112112.content: Now your not a dog lover, that's OK, I've heard there are some great cats out there willing to play.
112112.title: Other

1121122.content: OK so you like rodents, or is there something not covered in another section that I somehow missed?
1121122.title: Other

choices: Flock of Hive-minded, carnivorous doves. Ask the scientist, not me.
113.content: Bird of Prey, eh? Unfortunately, flying and big stomachs do not generally cooperate, but occasionally, we'll get some aviary action.
113.title: And you thought normal birds shit too much...

choices: Pred Cross-breeds (nagas,catgirls,etc-they can also be prey, on another channel)
114.content: So you're in to the supernatural, eh? And by supernatural, we aren't talking ghosts - this is super-nature! Although this is true of other sections, these channels in particular tend to overlap with others, so if there's not enough content to sate your thirst, it may be somewhere else.
114.title: Witty Chapter Title

choices: Plants - Big green mothas from outer space (or just the backyard...)
No fun for me, I'd rather do more channel surfing!
115.content:
There's no way we could buy enough channels for everything, so we just stuff all the miscellaneous film clippings here. Bon appetit!

...

What? Don't look at me like that. It's been years since my last French class...
115.title: This is like the chinese restaurant of menus.

12.content:
So, you're interested in stalking the competitors as they go about their not-so mundane lives? Please be aware, this camera will show you EVERYTHING they do during the day... if you're a creeper, good for you, but if not, there's always Tivo!*

*(Comcast doesn't exist in this dimension)
12.title: Normally, this would be considered illegal...

121.content: What age group are you looking for?
121.title: You've got Male!

122.content: Ok, what age group do you prefer?
122.title: The fairer sex (still not above cheating to win!)

123.content:
So, you're into herms? No problem, we have an implausable amount, Take your pick!

Now, for the age-old question... what age?
123.title: Human (in-between)

124.content: Surprise guest? I love surprises. Where is this person from? Actualy, don't tell me: It'd ruin the surprise!
124.title: Star Power!

choices: What am I I don't even...
125.content: Not a human, but still prey? Is that what you're after? Hope so, because your remote lacks a 'back' button
125.title: Not entirely human...

choices: Carnivorous Coast (Don't try to swim away!)
Masticating Mountain (Also a volcano, but Masticating Volcano just doesn't ring)
Starving Swamp (The swamp is literally starving, the quicksand may be sentient)
13.content: On this list, you get a variety of camera angles from a specific region. No type of predator or prey will be specified by default, but there's alot of meals to go around, so there should never be a dull moment. If nothings happening on a particular cam, just change the channel!
13.title: IT TOOK YEARS TO NAME THESE PLACES CAN YOU TELL?

14.content: If you're under 18 or just aren't cool enough to sit through a full digestion without puking, this channel is censored in real-time. The smiley face censor will cover any blood on-screen (and anything remotely red, for that matter), and our highly trained monkeys will do their best to edit out any severe graphic details as if they never happened.
14.title: ASFW (Almost Safe For Work)

choices: More users  (If anybody removes this option I'll give you a 3rd-party facepalm)
15.content:
If you feel like putting your fate in the hands of total online strangers, then you're in luck! Here, you can ship off to Isle de Rapace, and see what happens! You can write your segment however you want, and any sort of "canon" can be neglected. Or not. But it's a good idea to include:

A quick biography of your persona.
Who can add chapters to your story
Any plot points you want to stay present throughout the story, in any path
Basically anything you'd put in the beginning of an interactive story.
15.title: Just kinda ignoring the whole TV scene...

choices: He brings in more people from the outside world, prisoners or otherwise
He gives the animals a drug to make them less hungry... but with side effects...
He hires somebody else to come up with a plan while he watches TV
151.content:
In a private resort on an Island not too far from Isle de Rapace, Samson N. Spired chuckled to himself. In a room surrounded by large, panel-shaped screens, he could view over 1/4 of the cameras on the island at once. He was particularly fixated on four or five panels displaying a cross-island scavenger hunt between 16 contestants... 15 contestants... 12 contestants... 7 contestants. At this rate, the island could easily be cleared by the dawn of the first day. That wouldn't do... nobody would tune in to an Island with only animals! Even if they did, they'd be the nerds who watched animal planet! If his show got that kind of rep, it would never be taken seriously again!" Thinking quickly, samson decides to...

Note: Anybody can add to this plotline. And as anybody who actually read the last section knows, this is not necessarily canon. So when you write (I hope thats a 'when' and not an 'if'), don't worry about killing everybody off overnight.
151.title: Me? Who put Me in a Me story? I'm going to die!

info.brief_description:
Former criminals Vs. Starving,  enhanced wildlife. 

Live, for your viewing enjoyment!
info.description:
“Hey there, everyone, this is Brien Beachcrown! This evening, as I join you from a helicopter above the beautiful Isle de Rapace, I’m pioneering in reality TV shows with our hit-to-be, “Survivore”! With me for this special pilot episode is none other than the CEO of the Uninspired Network, Samson N. Spired! He can be a little long winded, so if you’re eager for action, just Tivo this segment and join us in a few minutes.”

“Good evening to all of those watching at home. In precisely 35 minutes, when the sun sets on Isle de Rapace, the animals will be released and the games shall begin. In one month, we will have our winner, should one be left. Before then, however, I’d like to take a moment to explain just why we’re breaking grounds today and setting a new standard for reality TV shows.

Firstly, “Survivore” contains content that no other stations would touch with a thirty-nine foot pole. Their poles simply aren’t as large as ours. We’re the only network cutting-edge enough to show our viewers live footage of 492 former criminals of all sexes as they fight for freedom – and survival - among the voracious wild animals (former pets charged with crimes and a hunger-inducing hormone) on the island. It’s going to be a brutal game, and it will only get tougher as the rules change later on. But at the same time, we’re reaching out to a younger demographic as well – more on that in a moment-”

“-Excuse me sir, did you say this was live? How do we fit a live show into a thirty minute block??”

“Hohoho! Brien, interjecting as if this wasn’t all pre-scripted!” I was just about to get to that, actually. For those of you who didn’t hear the news at last month’s conference, this is an event too big to be contained to one night a week. That’s why Uninspired inc. is not just revolutionizing the content, but how you view it, too! You see, we’ve bought out several hundred television channels, and each one of them will be streaming video, twenty-four seven, from countless cameras set up across the island. We even installed minicams inside the animal's stomachs (animal rights groups didn't like that...)! The channels are organized so that you can watch animal predators, human prey, or specific regions of the island. There are even a couple channels that contain edited, kid-friendly footage – we’ve dubbed it “Softivore! THE SHOW DOESN’T END JUST BECAUSE SOMEBODY BECOMES A SNACK! – we’ll just keep rolling, following the events of another animal, person, or place! Oh! And I almost forgot to talk about the scheduled competitions and Celebrity appearances! Every day-”

“-Sorry, boss, they’ll have to figure it out later - after this commercial break!”

“This advertising segment could be yours! Simply contribute something (A chapter, points etc.) to The Uninspired Network (TUN) and your name, and a shout-out, could appear here! It doesn’t even have to be related to Survivore! Apply now!”

“If you’d like to join in on the fun of Survivore, all you need is an interweb connection! For no particular reason, people and creatures with a Writing.com account will be allowed to interject themselves into the game! For free! If danger isn’t your thing, you can have your own helicopter/on-foot armed tour of the island! Simply go to the “Custom Profile” channel for details.”

“Unemployment is higher than ever. If you’re in need of money, we can help. Real money – not the dollar, not the Euro but the GP. Simply include your picture/link to your picture with your contribution and you can earn up to 1000 GP per illustrated chapter. In addition, you might get your drawing featured in this commercial, next time it airs! Can’t draw? Just try, we aren’t picky. Can’t write, but want to draw? Pick a scene, draw about it, then E-mail the pic to have it edited into the scene!”

“1 detailed review on your story:
500 GP
“3 spam reviews on your story:
1,500 GP
“Getting one chapter on your story for every chapter you contribute to Uninspired Inc?:
Priceless.”

And now to our feature presentation (Cue annoying THX theme)!
